name: Tea Siuuup
description:
The game made for Trijam #15: The 3-hour game jam.

Mad in 4h 15 min 45.21s, it's not 3h but I'm proud of myself that I was able to make something in that short time.
You play as a guy who wants to drink his TEA, but queen guards want to stop him. So shoot them.
You can drink Tea only when you are neither moving nor shooting. Your HEALTH is DROPPING with time and drinking TEA is rising him.

Play with:

A, D to shoot

UP, DOWN, LEFT, RIGHT to move
